summary: When scientists use eco-terrorism to impose their will on the world by affecting extremes in the weather, Intelligence Chief Cramden calls in top agent Derek Flint.
cast: James Coburn|Lee J. Cobb|Gila Golan|Edward Mulhare|Benson Fong|Shelby Grant|Sigrid Valdis|Gianna Serra|Helen Funai|Michael St. Clair|Rhys Williams|Russ Conway|Ena Hartman|Bill Walker|Peter Brocco|Fred Aldrich|Leon Alton|Totty Ames|George Blagoi|Eugene Borden|Nick Borgani|James Brolin|George Bruggeman|Steve Carruthers|Harry Carter|Lewis Charles|Vincent Cobb|George Dega|Bruno Della Santina|George DeNormand|Daniel Elam|Steven Geray|Rudy Germane|Bobby Gilbert|James Gonzalez|Joe Gray|Robert Gunner|Chuck Hicks|Shep Houghton|Walter Janovitz|Roy Jenson|Roy Johnson|Lou Krugman|Gayle Levant|Robert Locke Lorraine|Herbert Lytton|Harry Monty|Boyd 'Red' Morgan|Alberto Morin|George Perina|Jack Raine|Fred Rapport|Victor Romito|Ted Roter|Tura Satana|Stephen Soldi|Norman Stevans|Peter Virgo|Bill White Jr.|Glenn R. Wilder|Lori Williams|Dick Wilson|Anatol Winogradoff
title: Flint, agente secreto
